snippet: The announcement came as it reported an 11 percent rise in fourth-quarter profit.
abstract: American Express announces plans to cut around 6 percent of its total work force, or more than 4,000 jobs, in 2015 as part of effort to improve efficiency; company reports 11 percent gain in fourth-quarter profit.
lead_paragraph: The announcement came as it reported an 11 percent rise in fourth-quarter profit.

headline.main: Profit for American Express, and Elimination of 4,000 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Profit for American Express, and Elimination of 4,000 Jobs
